data.quote: The greatness of humanity is not in being human,but in being humane.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: The greatest religion is being true to be true to your own nature.Have faith in yourselves.
data.author: Swami Vivekananda

data.quote: Don’t read success stories, you will only get message. Read failure stories, you will get some ideas to get success.
data.author: Dr.APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Your best teacher is your last mistake.
data.author: Dr.APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear,but the triumph over it.The brave man is not the one who does not feel afraid,but he who conquers that fear.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: Tremendous amounts of talent are being lost to our society just because that talent wears a skirt.
data.author: Shirley Chisholm

data.quote: I raise up my voice not so I can shout but so that those wothout a voice can be heard.
data.author: Malala Yousafzai

data.quote: A life totally commited to God has nothing to fear,nothing to lose,nothing to regret.
data.author: Pandita Ramabai

data.quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies,but just as much to stand up to our friends.
data.author: J.K. Rowling

data.quote: I had always been feeling uncomfortable in my mind about giving advice to others and not acting upon it myself.
data.author: Lal Bahadur Shastri

data.quote: In a day,when you don't come across any problems-you can be sure that you are travelling in a wrong path.
data.author: Swami Vivekananda

data.quote: I think it's great to be flawed. I am hugely flawed, and I like it this way. That's the fun of life. You fall, get up, make mistakes, learn from them, be human and be you.
data.author: Priyanka Chopra

data.quote: Nothing is impossible,the word itself says 'I'm possible!'
data.author: Audrey Hepburn

data.quote: I can is 100 times more important than IQ.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: The person who says something is impossible shouldn’t interrupt the person who is doing it.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: If not me, who? If not now, when?
data.author: Emma Watson

data.quote: To walk into nature is to witness a thousand miracles.
data.author: Mary Davis

data.quote: Everything should be made as simple as possible but not simpler.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: A good traveller has no has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving.
data.author: Lao Tzu

data.quote: You educate a man; you educate a man. You educate a woman; you educate a generation.
data.author: Brigham Young

data.quote: What gets scary is when your self-worth is tied up in what strangers think of you.
data.author: Emma Watson

data.quote: One best book is equal to hundred good friends, but one good friend is equal to a library.
data.author: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam
